I don't know how to attempt to reproduce this in a nightly, so all I have is the results for the 7->8 upgrade I just did.

comments.raw_text:
The bug is that before the update I'm told that a certain addon will be disabled, which ends up not being disabled. The implication is that a compatible update is not available at this stage.

I have a suspicion that the compatibility check before the upgrade is performing as designed, but the design is not ideal: the user doesn't want to know if the currently installed version is compatible; rather, whether one that *is* compatible has already been published.
